name: system_info
description: Get comprehensive system information: OS, CPU, GPU, memory, disk, network, process, battery, USB, audio, display, BIOS, environment, users, services, software, temperature, Bluetooth, printers. Supports querying single or multiple categories simultaneously. Cross-platform (Windows/Linux/macOS).

category.description: Single category to retrieve (deprecated, use 'categories' for multiple). Use 'all' for complete system overview.

categories.description: Multiple categories to retrieve simultaneously (e.g., ['cpu', 'gpu', 'memory']). Overrides 'category' if provided.

detailed.description: Include detailed technical specifications and metrics.

useCache.description: Enable smart caching for system information (default: 7 days TTL)

cacheScope.description: Cache storage scope: memory-only, file-only, or both

oneOf.description: 当用户需要延迟处理/延迟反馈时使用：例如 '5分钟后'、'30秒后'、'明天09:00'、ISO 字符串。

when.description: 时间表达：如 '5分钟后' / '明天09:00' / ISO 字符串

language.description: 语言标识，例如 zh|en（默认 zh）

timezone.description: IANA 时区名称，例如 Asia/Shanghai

schedule.description: 可选：当用户需要延迟处理/延迟反馈时使用；仅控制反馈时间，不延迟执行。若到点未完成，将先反馈进行中状态。
